data.eml:eml: Black Corals (Anthozoa: Antipatharia) from the Southwestern Atlantic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lima, Manuela M., Cordeiro, Ralf T. S., Perez, Carlos D. (2019): Black Corals (Anthozoa: Antipatharia) from the Southwestern Atlantic. Zootaxa 4692 (1): 1-67, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4692.1.1
